nodes.bodyText: nit: Maybe extracting the lambda body to a function could be useful.
can't be shared between single leader and multi leader I'm afraid (well it can, but the args requried and setup just don't make it worth it)
as a method such that I can refer to as a method reference feels pretty messy. I can however, make a class out of it instead, and I just pass a new instance of the class in to where I want to use it.
nit: extract factory.components() to a local variable since its used multiple times?

nodes.bodyText: I guess this is fine as this is used only in testing, but is this intentional? Seems if we want to keep this ERROR is pretty harsh
changed to INFO
Feels a little hacky, but I guess this is from the previous tests.

explained offline, the TemplateVariables make the config that gets used in tests, so we can define the port to whatever sequence we want, and it will generate the right config. We just happen to continue from the previous tests.
fine for now, I imagine this will get a lot more complicated with the auto migration mode
surely this class should be something like a LeaderPingerFactoryContainer? The name is a little tricky
and this guy is a LeaderPingerFactoryFactory 😉 (really, just stick with Builder)
